articles.title: About me
articles.description:
I grew up in Basel, Switzerland.

In 2015, I startet my studies of Psychology at the University of Basel, receiving my Master of Science in Psychology in 2019.

articles.title: Welcom to my Website
articles.description:
Currently this page is still under construction.

My name is Sebastian A. C. Perrig. I am a Ph.D. student at the Human-Computer Interaction Research Group of the Center for General Psychology and Methodology, Faculty of Psychology, University of Basel.

My interests lie in the area of measurement methodology and scale construction for the recording of various constructs that make up the experience of users. Thus, I am interested in how to measure user experience (UX), which aspects are considered relevant for UX, and how to make UX as a whole more tangible. The review and comparison of existing questionnaires as well as the development of new relevant scales are the focus of my research.

One key construct of UX that especially interestst me is interface aesthetics, and how a product's aesthetics influence both the experience of users and how they interact with a product.
